thought: To craft a magma block, I need to craft magma cream, which requires blaze powder and slime balls. To get blaze powder, I need to craft it from blaze rods. I will start by moving the blaze rod at slot 15 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: magma_block

Ok

thought: To craft a magma_block, I first need to craft 4 magma_creams. To craft a magma_cream, I need a blaze_powder and a slime_ball. I have 2 blaze_powers, but no slime_balls. However, I do have a blaze_rod which I can craft into 2 blaze_powders. So I will first move the blaze_rod to the crafting grid to craft more blaze_powders.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: magma_block

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 2
